definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]

Zhong1 E2 bian1 jie4 xie2 yi4

sentences.english: We have full confidence in the prospect of this relationship.
sentences.chinese: 我们对中俄关系发展的前景呢，充满信心。

sentences.english: Li Zhaoxing said that China-Russia relations have yielded pleasing results this year.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星表示，中俄关系今年又取得可喜成果。

sentences.english: Did they touch upon cooperation among China, Russia and India?
sentences.chinese: 是否还谈到中俄印三方合作的问题？

sentences.english: I believe the current development of Sino-Russian relations is good.
sentences.chinese: 我认为当前中俄关系的发展是好的。

sentences.english: Hu noted that China-Russia relations enjoy a sound momentum of development.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛表示，中俄关系呈现良好发展势头。

sentences.english: We believe that Prime Minister Putin's visit will further advance China-Russia relations.
sentences.chinese: 相信普京总理此访将进一步推动中俄关系向前发展。

sentences.english: Hu said there had been all-round progress in China-Russia relations in the first half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛强调，今年上半年，中俄关系全面向前推进。

sentences.english: Currently, Sino-Russian relationship is at its best in history.
sentences.chinese: 当前中俄关系正处于历史上最好时期。

sentences.english: China-Russia relations show a sound momentum of dynamic growth this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年，中俄关系显示出蓬勃发展的良好势头。

definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
NATO/abbr. for 北大西洋公約組織|北大西洋公约组织[Bei3 Da4 xi1 Yang2 Gong1 yue1 Zu3 zhi1], North Atlantic Treaty Organization
